import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useMediaQuery } from 'react-responsive' import Loader from './Loader' import '../styles/Movielist.css' import '../styles/ResponsiveMovielist.css' const Movielist = (props) => { const scroll_left = () => { document.getElementById(props.id).scrollLeft += 1500; // see readme.md } const scroll_right = () => { document.getElementById(props.id).scrollLeft += -1500; // REDO } const img_url = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500" // api address for poster img const isDesktopOrLaptop = useMediaQuery({ query: '(min-device-width: 1225px)' }) const isTabletOrMobileDevice = useMediaQuery({ query: '(max-device-width: 1224px)' }) return( <> {isDesktopOrLaptop &&
{props.title}
❮
❯
{props.movies.map( (movie, i) =>
{props.loading ? ( ) : ( <>

{movie.overview}

☆{movie.vote_average}

props.handlelist(movie)}>{props.function}

)}
)}
} {isTabletOrMobileDevice &&
{props.title}
{props.loading && <>
} {!props.loading && props.movies.map( (movie, i) =>
props.toggle(movie)}>
)}
} ) } export default Movielist
